chat_history.message:
Dear Backcare,

The parcel is still at the pickup point, please inform the customer about it.

Regards,
KJ

Dear Backcare,

The parcel has been returned to our warehouse. Would the customer prefer a refund or a reshipment?

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

we have forwarded the request to the costumer.

We will keep you updated ASAP.

Thank you for your patience.

Regards,
Marco from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

we still have no reply from the costumer.

Would you please refund the costumer ?

Please keep us updated ASAP.

Thank you.

Regards,
Marco from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. We will proceed with the refund soon.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

keep us updated ASAP, so we can inform the costumer.

Thank you.

Regards,
Marco from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
